title: Sepolia node from sepolia.otterscan.io crashed
body:
That's all logs I have, don't know if it helps....

The build is based on `v2022.02.03`  tag.

```
INFO[03-10|03:41:41.831] RPC Daemon notified of new headers       from=662679 to=662680
INFO[03-10|03:41:41.831] [1/16 Headers] Waiting for headers...    from=662680
INFO[03-10|03:41:47.145] [1/16 Headers] Processed                 highest inserted=662681 age=6s
panic: send on closed channel

goroutine 24962075 [running]:
```
